title: Bug 117981 - Unable to select any item in library outline view on first attempt
description:
Description:
Any item in the library outline view cannot be selected on the first attempt.

Steps to reproduce:
1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Try to select the label item in the library outline view.

OB: Unable to select the label item in the library outline view on the first attempt.

EB: The label item in the library outline view should be selectable on the first attempt.

SR: 1. Add a label in a library file.
2. Open the library outline view.
3. Attempt to select the label item.
